io.sarl.util

Class Scopes

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.util.Scopes
  • Deprecated. 
    since 0.7, replaced by closure expressions.

    @Deprecated
public final class Scopes
extends Object
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return scopes.

    0.7.2 2018-04-03 12:04:08
